title: Ticket #104: GLEXEC_JOB: updating a job's proxy while it's running doesn't work
description:
This applies to PrivSep mode as well.

A basic approach to fixing this is to use these modes' "exec-as-user" mechanisms to invoke a process that plops the updated proxy into the sandbox.
remarks:
I told Igor I would try to get to this before leaving the project.
